publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1505 Maureen Macmillan: Congratulations to Stromness Academy-That the Parliament congratulates the 18 teams of young people who took part in the Young Enterprise Scotland national finals in Edinburgh on 16 June 2004 after qualifying in their regional finals earlier this year and particularly congratulates the team from Stromness Academy, Orkney, which was the overall award winner with its business, Orkney Ink.
S2M-1505 Congratulations to Stromness Academy (lodged on 21 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1505 Maureen Macmillan: Congratulations to Stromness Academy-That the Parliament congratulates the 18 teams of young people who took part in the Young Enterprise Scotland national finals in Edinburgh on 16 June 2004 after qualifying in their regional finals earlier this year and particularly congratulates the team from Stromness Academy, Orkney, which was the overall award winner with its business, Orkney Ink. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-1505 Congratulations to Stromness Academy (lodged on 21 June 2004) Mary Scanlon*
